text: 5.18 Mat 26.4, Jon 7.1, 7.19, 7.30, 10.30, 10.33, Plp 2.6 Anɨb agek, Juda bɨawl okok nɨŋɨd kɨli nɨgɨlak, Juda añɨŋ lep ñɨn awl tɨbɨlɨkup ak pen, tap olap sek gek, nop mɨlɨk tɨmel nɨgɨlak. Ne abe agak, God Bapi yad agak. Ak God mɨdeb tek mɨdebin agup agɨl nɨgɨlak. Anɨb ak tek, nop ned ñagɨnɨgun agɨl gos nɨgɨlak ak, kɨles yɨbɨl gɨl nɨgɨlak.
